attributes.action: introduce a fine of £50 for each time an apostrophe is misused or omitted by businesses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the ability to express oneself clearly is a fundamental part of human existence, and this is under threat from the illiterates and incompetents who are permitted to write signs and posters to be displayed in the premises of local businesses. We believe that a £50 fine for each instance of a misused apostrophe would enhance the local High Street from a place that makes us shudder with annoyance to, if not a haven of Englishness, then at least a tolerable experience.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
